alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 11:13PM CDT until July 09 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1113 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Elkhart, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Texhoma, Optima, Eva, Hough, Griggs and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
